TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecificControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Proporciona compatibilidad de análisis para construcciones de DeviceSpecific/Choice.

span.span: Provides parsing support for DeviceSpecific/Choice constructs.

summary.span: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El clase crea internamente y utiliza el analizador de páginas al analizar un [ \](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) elemento.The class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a [\](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) element. El clase implementa los siguientes comportamientos de persistencia: omite el espacio en blanco directamente dentro del control, y solo permite un [ \](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) como elemento secundario.The class implements the following persistence behaviors: It ignores white space directly inside the control, and it allows only a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element as child.

permission.span: para trabajar en un entorno hospedado.

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
